code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Complaints.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Complaints=()=>{const[complaints,setComplaints]=useState([]);const[showForm,setShowForm]=useState(false);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',houseNumber:'',complaintText:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchComplaints();},[]);const fetchComplaints=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/complaints');setComplaints(res.data);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/complaints',formData);setFormData({name:'',houseNumber:'',complaintText:''});setShowForm(false);fetchComplaints();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"complaints-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Resident Complaints"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"new-complaint-btn",onClick:()=>setShowForm(!showForm),children:showForm?'Cancel':'➕ New Complaint'}),showForm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"complaint-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Your Name",value:formData.name,required:true,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"House Number",value:formData.houseNumber,required:true,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,houseNumber:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Enter your complaint...",value:formData.complaintText,required:true,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,complaintText:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-btn",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"complaints-list",children:complaints.map(comp=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"complaint-tile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[comp.name," - House ",comp.houseNumber]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:comp.complaintText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:new Date(comp.createdAt).toLocaleString()})]},comp._id))})]});};export default Complaints;
